name: Vegeodor PAE
description: Vegeodor PAE is a mixture of surfactants, micro-organisms and enzymes of natural origin obtained by fermentation. Eliminates bad odors at the source without damaging surfaces and diffuses a fresh smell for an immediate and neutral masking effect. Allows you to destroy odors such as urine, tobacco, cooking odors, pipe odors, etc. Ideal for the treatment of toilets, showers, bathtubs, sinks, toilets, urinals, garbage rooms, garbage cans, garbage disposals, but also for interiors of cars, busses, trams and trains.
